identity.title: (Sorting) Sort descendingly a list of persons

content.prompt: Complete the method sortPersonListDescending in order to return a descendingly sorted ArrayList of Person objects, based on lexicographical order of last names.Hint: use compareTo() method from String class to lexicographically compare two Strings. See more: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/String.html#compareTo(java.lang.String)
